sqlMap.select: SELECT CG.CART_SN, CG.GOODS_CODE, FN_PURCHS_AMOUNT(CG.ESNTL_ID, CG.CART_SN) AS PURCHS_AMOUNT, CG.TOUR_DE, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_INTRCN, G.FILE_CODE, CG.WRITNG_ID, CG.WRITNG_DE FROM TB_CART_GOODS CG INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON G.GOODS_CODE = CG.GOODS_CODE AND G.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE CG.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND CG.CART_SN = #cart_sn# AND CG.EXPRTN_AT = 'N'

SELECT GN.NMPR_SN, GN.NMPR_CND, GN.SETUP_AMOUNT, NVL(CN.NMPR_CO,0) AS NMPR_CO FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR GN LEFT JOIN TB_CART_NMPR CN ON GN.GOODS_CODE = CN.GOODS_CODE AND GN.NMPR_SN = CN.NMPR_SN AND CN.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND CN.CART_SN = #cart_sn# WHERE GN.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND GN.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# ORDER BY GN.NMPR_SN ASC

SELECT G.GOODS_NM FROM TB_GOODS G INNER JOIN TB_GOODS_SCHDUL GS ON GS.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE AND GS.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE G.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND G.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# AND #tour_de# BETWEEN GS.BEGIN_DE AND GS.END_DE

SELECT SUM(GN.SETUP_AMOUNT * CN.NMPR_CO) AS PURCHS_AMOUNT FROM TB_CART_GOODS CG INNER JOIN TB_CART_NMPR CN ON CN.ESNTL_ID = CG.ESNTL_ID AND CN.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN INNER JOIN TB_GOODS_NMPR GN ON CN.GOODS_CODE = GN.GOODS_CODE AND CN.NMPR_SN = GN.NMPR_SN WHERE CG.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND CG.EXPRTN_AT = 'N'
SELECT NVL(MAX(CART_SN)+1, 1) FROM TB_CART_GOODS WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CART_GOODS( ESNTL_ID, CART_SN, GOODS_CODE, PURCHS_AMOUNT, TOUR_DE, EXPRTN_AT, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DE ) VALUES( #esntl_id#, #cart_sn#, #goods_code#, #purchs_amount#, #tour_de#, 'N', #esntl_id#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_CART_GOODS CG SET TOUR_DE = #tour_de#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CART_NMPR( ESNTL_ID, CART_SN, GOODS_CODE, NMPR_SN, NMPR_CO ) VALUES( #esntl_id#, #cart_sn#, #goods_code#, #nmpr_sn#, #nmpr_co# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CART_NMPR WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
